scan_table_check.description: The name of a Script Include that contains a client callable class must end with "ClientAPI".
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Client callable Script Includes
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Rename the Script Include (and the contained class) so that it ends with "ClientAPI".
scan_table_check.short_description: Client callable Script Include name must end with "ClientAPI"
